Articles.Content:
I just set up .23.5 with all my mods and everything and I don't really know what you guys really did but OUTSTANDING. The game runs sooo much smoother with my mods and makes me wish I had upgraded sooner. Keep up the good work, you guys rock.

Edited May 7, 2014 by KasperVld
Hopefully 0.24 comes out soon but we're glad you updated! What was your previous version?
It came out over a month ago, but I guess it is indeed awesome.
.23 but it was so buggy with some of the mods i love to use. this version is a dream.

I have to agree, 23.5 did an awesome job of optimizing something and now KSP is much more stable. That, and the new Kerbodyne 3.75m parts are awesome and fun to use. Still trying to make a spaceplane around the 4 rocket cluster engine.
It always makes the game feel 1000x more enjoyable when it gets smoother! It's around those times that I end up playing all night...
Please keep the profanity away from these forums
i thought it was pretty fun to try and catch Space rocks But i Also liked the Massive parts Now I can Launch My giant Ships.

I had stopped playing for a few weeks from a little before 0.23 until the new update.

But the optimization they did changed a lot for me. I can finally enjoy building my stations, my modular bases, and I could even keep my old saves.

Thank you SQUAD.
